reviewText: The characters in this series are fantastic to watch. If you enjoy police/crime shows, this will probably be right up your alley.
Enduring classic.  I love watching this. Beverly Garland is poised, smart and self-confident, as well as beautiful.

I haven't watched them all yet. But I found these after my grandmother and I were watching the old television show Scarecrow and Mrs. King. When she saw Beverly Garland as Amanda's mother, she commented that she was a policewoman on another show. We are all excited to go back in time to watch this season too!

The series Decoy is great and Beverly Garland is pitch perfect. Just be aware that these dvds seem to have been taken from public domain versions and haven't been remastered or cleaned up. The quality of the dvds is just okay, though the series itself is terrific.

I bought this DVD.because I have ever seen this movie when I was a child. I think,in some case,female police officers can work better than male police officers. Decoy police woman can easily entice criminals for easy arrests because of her charm. Beverly Garland plays the role of Casey Jones perfectly. The series also features early performances by such future stars as Larry Hagman and Peter Falk. Decoy Police Woman  is one of my favorite American TV.series of all times.
